name: DengueVirusInfectionTestsForDengueVirusNucleicAcid
title: Dengue Virus Infection (Tests for dengue virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of dengue virus nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Dengue virus nucleic acid;

LOINC search:  dengue nucleic -panel -donor),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests and donor test)
